text: Hi all, can anyone tell if there is an api endpoint to get a menu using the id?

Thank you very much :slightly_smiling_face:
And taking advantage of you, is there any to create modules?
I believe the documentation for the API is almost done and will be released soon
This is good news for me, thank you for your time :slightly_smiling_face:

Hi - in chatflows, if I am calling webhooks, is it possible to set values that are usable in successive chat flow modules.  For example in the GetZip module - I call a set of code that responds with the common name of the city that surrounds a zipcode.  In successive modules I want to be able to reference that city name.  How do you set/get that from node snippets/webhooks?
